PackageOracle.name: DA_SETTOP_BOX_INSTANCE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SETTOP_BOX_INSTANCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.045415000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,soc_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_site IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_date IN DATE
,cas_id IN VARCHAR2
,estb_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ecm_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ethernet_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,cmci_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,rf4ce_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,soc_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_site IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_date IN DATE
,cas_id IN VARCHAR2
,estb_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ecm_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ethernet_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,cmci_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,rf4ce_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_instance_id IN NUMBER
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,soc_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_site IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_date IN DATE
,cas_id IN VARCHAR2
,estb_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ecm_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ethernet_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,cmci_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,rf4ce_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_settop_box_instance;

body.name: DA_SETTOP_BOX_INSTANCE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SETTOP_BOX_INSTANCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.058897000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,soc_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_site IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_date IN DATE
,cas_id IN VARCHAR2
,estb_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ecm_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ethernet_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,cmci_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,rf4ce_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_instance.add(fx), parms=' || serial_num || '|' || model_nm || '|' || soc_part_num || '|' || manufacturer || '|' || manufacturer_site || '|' || manufacturer_date || '|' || cas_id || '|' || estb_mac_address || '|' || ecm_mac_address || '|' || ethernet_mac_address || '|' || cmci_mac_address || '|' || rf4ce_mac_address || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_settop_box_instance a
(
a.settop_box_instance_id
,a.serial_num
,a.model_nm
,a.soc_part_num
,a.manufacturer
,a.manufacturer_site
,a.manufacturer_date
,a.cas_id
,a.estb_mac_address
,a.ecm_mac_address
,a.ethernet_mac_address
,a.cmci_mac_address
,a.rf4ce_mac_address
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_settop_box_instance_id.NEXTVAL
,add.serial_num
,add.model_nm
,add.soc_part_num
,add.manufacturer
,add.manufacturer_site
,add.manufacturer_date
,add.cas_id
,add.estb_mac_address
,add.ecm_mac_address
,add.ethernet_mac_address
,add.cmci_mac_address
,add.rf4ce_mac_address
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.settop_box_instance_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_instance.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,soc_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_site IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_date IN DATE
,cas_id IN VARCHAR2
,estb_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ecm_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ethernet_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,cmci_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,rf4ce_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_instance.add, parms=' || serial_num || '|' || model_nm || '|' || soc_part_num || '|' || manufacturer || '|' || manufacturer_site || '|' || manufacturer_date || '|' || cas_id || '|' || estb_mac_address || '|' || ecm_mac_address || '|' || ethernet_mac_address || '|' || cmci_mac_address || '|' || rf4ce_mac_address || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_settop_box_instance a
(
a.settop_box_instance_id
,a.serial_num
,a.model_nm
,a.soc_part_num
,a.manufacturer
,a.manufacturer_site
,a.manufacturer_date
,a.cas_id
,a.estb_mac_address
,a.ecm_mac_address
,a.ethernet_mac_address
,a.cmci_mac_address
,a.rf4ce_mac_address
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_settop_box_instance_id.NEXTVAL
,add.serial_num
,add.model_nm
,add.soc_part_num
,add.manufacturer
,add.manufacturer_site
,add.manufacturer_date
,add.cas_id
,add.estb_mac_address
,add.ecm_mac_address
,add.ethernet_mac_address
,add.cmci_mac_address
,add.rf4ce_mac_address
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_instance.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_instance_id IN NUMBER
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,soc_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_site IN VARCHAR2
,manufacturer_date IN DATE
,cas_id IN VARCHAR2
,estb_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ecm_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,ethernet_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,cmci_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,rf4ce_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_instance.add, parms=' || settop_box_instance_id || '|' || serial_num || '|' || model_nm || '|' || soc_part_num || '|' || manufacturer || '|' || manufacturer_site || '|' || manufacturer_date || '|' || cas_id || '|' || estb_mac_address || '|' || ecm_mac_address || '|' || ethernet_mac_address || '|' || cmci_mac_address || '|' || rf4ce_mac_address || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_settop_box_instance a
(
a.settop_box_instance_id
,a.serial_num
,a.model_nm
,a.soc_part_num
,a.manufacturer
,a.manufacturer_site
,a.manufacturer_date
,a.cas_id
,a.estb_mac_address
,a.ecm_mac_address
,a.ethernet_mac_address
,a.cmci_mac_address
,a.rf4ce_mac_address
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.settop_box_instance_id
,add.serial_num
,add.model_nm
,add.soc_part_num
,add.manufacturer
,add.manufacturer_site
,add.manufacturer_date
,add.cas_id
,add.estb_mac_address
,add.ecm_mac_address
,add.ethernet_mac_address
,add.cmci_mac_address
,add.rf4ce_mac_address
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_instance.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_instance.del, parms=' || settop_box_instance_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_settop_box_instance a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.settop_box_instance_id = del.settop_box_instance_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_instance.del');

END del;

END da_settop_box_instance;
